pages.text: $(italic)The most interesting thing about the Endermen is, without question, their teleportation ability. You were pretty successful replicating it! However, to determine the destination of the teleport, you must first take a snapshot of the position.$(br)Endermen don't have to do that - why?

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: A Limitation of the Ender Splice is, that is can only be used in the same dimension it was bound to.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: By charging it as if you would want to charge a crossbow, you bind it to your current position.$(br2)The second use will teleport you back to that original location. Can even be used on other players.

pages.title: Unbreaking
pages.text: Enchanting an Ender Splice with Unbreaking by using the $(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)Enchanter$(/l) decreases the chance of it breaking on use.

pages.title: Resonance
pages.text: Enchanting an Ender Splice with Resonance by using the $(l:enchanting/enchanting_items)Enchanter$(/l) will allow for interdimensional teleport.
